column8: Out there we got hungry lions
Hundred other ways of dyin'    (gather round, gather round)
In here we got dinner fryin'   (gather round, gather round)
Gather round, come gather round the fire

column9: been some places! (sing around, sing around)

column8: Trouble's etched upon your face, yeah, (sing around, sing around)
Take that trouble,   shout it loud! Sing around, sing around
Take that trouble,   sing it round the fire

column9: dance around, let's dance around the fire, together
gy-r-te and    shake your body round
dance around, come dance around the fire, together
gy-r-ate and   shake your body round

column8: Bones all soaked the snow is blowin'
feel that heat and blood flowin'
Feel it flowin', dancing round the fire
